programme.title: Johnny Madison Williams
programme.short_synopsis: Can a crook be a national hero, and who was Johnny Madison Williams Jnr?
programme.medium_synopsis: Bank robber Johnny Madison Williams Junior's story,  leads Cooke to explore the concept of the crook as a national hero, and anticipate the fallout from the OJ Simpson trial.

programme.title: Letter from America by Alistair Cooke
programme.short_synopsis: Alistair Cooke’s weekly talks on American life, history and politics from 1946 – 2004.
